full_text: Knitted hat and neck-warmer in DROPS Daisy or DROPS Karisma. The hat and neck-warmer are worked bottom up in rib and stocking stitch. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ see the CREME CARAMEL NECK-WARMER pattern here ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #cremecaramelset DROPS Design: Pattern da-047 Yarn group B WHOLE SET : SIZES : S/M – M/L - L/XL YARN FOR WHOLE SET : DROPS DAISY from Garnstudio (belongs to yarn group B) 250-300-300 g colour 13, Almond Or use: DROPS KARISMA from Garnstudio (belongs to yarn group B) 300-350-350 g colour 91, Almond HAT : SIZES : S/M – M/L - L/XL Fits head-size: 54/56 - 56/58 - 58/60 cm YARN FOR HAT : DROPS DAISY from Garnstudio (belongs to yarn group B) 100-100-100 g colour 13, Almond Or use: DROPS KARISMA from Garnstudio (belongs to yarn group B) 100-100-150 g colour 91, Almond NEEDLES FOR HAT : DROPS CIRCULAR NEEDLE SIZE 3.5 MM: Length 40 cm. DROPS CIRCULAR NEEDLE SIZE 3 MM: Length 40 cm. DROPS DOUBLE POINTED NEEDLES SIZE 3.5 MM. DROPS CABLE NEEDLE. The technique MAGIC LOOP can be used – you then only need 80 cm circular needle in each size. KNITTING TENSION FOR HAT : 22 stitches in width and 30 rows in height with stocking stitch on needle size 3.5 mm = 10 x 10 cm. NOTE: Needle size is only a guide. If you get too many stitches within 10 cm, change to a larger needle size. If you get too few stitches within 10 cm, change to a smaller needle size.
name: Ravelry: 261-53 Creme Caramel Hat pattern by DROPS design
